definition: to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up

sentences.english: Can web vulnerability scanners help you remediate the vulnerability?
sentences.chinese: Web漏洞掃描器能幫助我們修補漏洞嗎？

sentences.english: For ease of installation, there’s really nothing that beats Barcode Scanner.
sentences.chinese: 安裝條碼掃描器很簡單，沒有任何困難。

sentences.english: Metrologic shop for computers and bar code scanners to read product reviews.
sentences.chinese: 店內碼捷儀器硬件和條碼掃描器讀取商品評論。

sentences.english: The image - dissector scanner is another heavily used and very successful low light level detector.
sentences.chinese: 析象管掃描器是另一種常用而且很成功的微光探測器。

sentences.english: FAQ . To address this issue, we now have multiple scanner support.
sentences.chinese: 爲了解決這個問題，就有了對多掃描器的支持。

sentences.english: Rem saw to it that the ship didn't get up, lancing it open from crotch to scanner.
sentences.chinese: 雷幹掉了這架戰機，從襠部一直到掃描器開膛破肚。

sentences.english: Each sorting station has a scanner which scans each parcel for prohibited things.
sentences.chinese: 每個儲存站點都有掃描器可以掃描違禁品。

sentences.english: Using a new scanner to check this new brooder .
sentences.chinese: 利用新的掃描器來掃描這尾新種魚。

sentences.english: The new tool consists of the main-machine and the scanner.
sentences.chinese: 該設備主要由電子主機和掃描器兩部分組成。

sentences.english: He raked a plastic card across the scanner affixed to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他用一塑料卡滑過附在門上的掃描器。

sentences.english: Observation of Nanometer-sized Structures Using a Scanning Near-field Optical Microscope (SNOM);
sentences.chinese: 這種掃描器被用於掃描近場光學顯微鏡探測系統中。

sentences.english: This kind of scanner has been used in the system of scanning near field optical microscope.
sentences.chinese: 這種掃描器被用於掃描近場光學顯微鏡探測系統中。

sentences.english: Have you checked for malware using the on-demand scanner .
sentences.chinese: 你已經用手動掃描器查毒過了嗎？

sentences.english: My advice is to not depend only on what the scanner’ suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 我的建議是不要僅僅依賴於掃描器的安全建議信息。

sentences.english: The scanner generates a report informing you of what it discovered.
sentences.chinese: 掃描器生成一個報告，告知您所發現的問題。

sentences.english: Using a new scanner to check this new brooder.
sentences.chinese: 利用新的掃描器來掃描這尾新種魚。

definition: to monitor/to keep an eye on
